QueryViewSpec.Name: Rate Increase Non Monthly With Installment Balance 04-01-2014 Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Find those that were increased with an installment balance on 4/1/14 non-monthly frequency
QueryViewSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL:
with RGInstallmentsWithBalance as (select rsplit.REVENUEID, srs.ORIGINALSPONSORSHIPGIFTAMOUNT, srs.UPDATEDSPONSORSHIPGIFTAMOUNT, r.AMOUNT as RGAMOUNT, r.CONSTITUENTID, i.ID as INSTALLMENTID, i.DATE as INSTALLMENTDATE, i.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT as INSTALLMENTAMOUNT, dbo.UFN_RECURRINGGIFTINSTALLMENT_GETINSTALLMENTBALANCE(i.ID) as INSTALLMENTBALANCE, rsch.NEXTTRANSACTIONDATE, rb.AMOUNT as BACKUPAMOUNT, r.LOOKUPID as REVENUELOOKUPID
from dbo.USR_SPONSOR_RATECHANGE_SPONSORSHIPS srs join dbo.SPONSORSHIP s on s.ID = srs.SPONSORSHIPID join dbo.SPONSORSHIP s2 on s.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENTID = s2.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENTID and s2.ISMOSTRECENTFORCOMMITMENT = 1 join dbo.REVENUESPLIT rsplit on rsplit.ID = s2.REVENUESPLITID join dbo.REVENUE r on r.ID = rsplit.REVENUEID join dbo.REVENUESCHEDULE rsch on rsch.ID = r.ID join dbo.USR_RATEINCREASE_REVENUEBACKUP rb on r.ID = rb.ID join dbo.CONSTITUENT c on c.ID = s2.CONSTITUENTID join dbo.RECURRINGGIFTINSTALLMENT i on i.REVENUEID = r.ID
where srs.INCREASERATE = 1 and s2.STATUSCODE = 1 and srs.ORIGINALSPONSORSHIPGIFTAMOUNT = rb.AMOUNT and srs.UPDATEDSPONSORSHIPGIFTAMOUNT = r.AMOUNT and rsch.FREQUENCYCODE <> 3 -- Monthly and i.[DATE] = '4/1/14' and i.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT = srs.UPDATEDSPONSORSHIPGIFTAMOUNT ) select ib1.REVENUEID, ib1.CONSTITUENTID, ib1.INSTALLMENTID, c.LOOKUPID as CONSTITUENTLOOKUPID, c.NAME as CONSTITUENTNAME, ib1.INSTALLMENTDATE, ib1.INSTALLMENTAMOUNT, ib1.INSTALLMENTBALANCE, ib1.UPDATEDSPONSORSHIPGIFTAMOUNT, ib1.ORIGINALSPONSORSHIPGIFTAMOUNT, ib1.BACKUPAMOUNT, ib1.RGAMOUNT, case when INSTALLMENTBALANCE < UPDATEDSPONSORSHIPGIFTAMOUNT - ORIGINALSPONSORSHIPGIFTAMOUNT then INSTALLMENTBALANCE else UPDATEDSPONSORSHIPGIFTAMOUNT - ORIGINALSPONSORSHIPGIFTAMOUNT end as WRITEOFFAMOUNT, ib1.NEXTTRANSACTIONDATE, ib1.REVENUELOOKUPID from RGInstallmentsWithBalance ib1 join dbo.CONSTITUENT c on c.ID = ib1.CONSTITUENTID
where INSTALLMENTBALANCE > 0
